post-install-cmd: curl -s https://api.github.com/repos/adminerevo/adminerevo/releases/latest | grep 'browser_download_url.*adminer-' | cut -d '"' -f 4 | xargs -n 1 curl -L -o glued/adminer.php
composer configure || echo "[FAIL] Failed to configure glued. Please make sure all env variables are set. Rerun composer configure."
echo "Run 'composer nginx' manually to pick restart this microservice"
post-update-cmd: curl -s https://api.github.com/repos/adminerevo/adminerevo/releases/latest | grep 'browser_download_url.*adminer-' | cut -d '"' -f 4 | xargs -n 1 curl -L -o glued/adminer.php
composer configure || echo "[FAIL] Failed to configure glued. Please make sure all env variables are set. Rerun composer configure."
echo "Run 'composer nginx' manually to pick restart this microservice"
